name: Escape Theodore
description:
If it is too wide use Fullscreen!! It should work then! (The blue button in bottom right corner of the screen).

It’s been a long day of mining for you and it’s time to go home. Try find your way out of the cave with your headlight and upgrades you find along the way. But beware of the horrendous beasts…THEODORE!

Programming: Bubbz1

Graphics: cottagekore

Assets Used:

Font: Free Pixel Art Font  - Thaleah by Tiny Worlds

Font: 04b_30 by 04 On DaFont
